amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds to promulgate, implement, or enforce any regulations that would mandate GPS tracking or event data recorders in light-duty noncommercial passenger motor vehicles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to promulgate, implement, or enforce any regulations that would mandate GPS tracking or event data recorders in light-duty noncommercial passenger motor vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
